post.title: great deal on receiver/speaker system
post.content: if you are in the market for a receiver and 5.1 speaker system look no further. w w w .6 a v e.com/shop/product.aspx?sku=cesrxv2700kht3005 brand new yamaha rx-v2700 + kef 3005 5.1 surround sound speaker system for less that $2,400. you can't beat this, i'm sure of it.
